headline: Martin Marietta Materials (MLM): Assessing Valuation After a Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run
summary: Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) has been quietly grinding higher, with shares up over the past year as steady revenue and earnings growth backstop its premium valuation. Investors are watching whether that momentum can reasonably continue. See our latest analysis for Martin Marietta Materials. The recent move to a $623.41 share price caps a strong year to date, with a 22.1% share price return reflecting steady demand for infrastructure exposure and a three year total shareholder return of...
